quote_first: We are on Colaba Causeway now, just for a moment, to reveal that at
quote_last: , the police are hunting for a dangerous criminal. His name: Joseph D'Costa. The orderly is absent, has been absent for several days, from his work at the Nursing Home, from his room near the slaughterhouse, and from the life of a distraught virginal Mary
title: Midnight's Children
author: Salman Rushdie
